about_the_game:
Welcome to the playable demo of Feudums, a game currently in development. Remember, this is a free PRE-early access version of the game. You can always find the latest demo on our web page, but for those afraid to download a game from an unknown, we wanted to provide the opportunity to do it inside Steam.

Our demos are always updated as new milestone builds are completed or we have quality of life (QoL) improvements to add. We always invite the community to play our game and give us any feedback you have afterwards. We love to hear from our players!

Just remember, we are PRE-early access: much of the game is not yet available as we continue to plug away on development. This is more like a minimum viable product so you can have a first impression and tell us whether we're on the right track. While we do our best to ship stable previews, don’t be surprised if you find a few bugs. If you are unlucky enough to find one, please make sure to report it so we can fix it for our next update!

If pre-beta games are not your cup of tea, that is completely fine. Please bear with us until we ship a more or less feature-complete public beta.
detailed_description:
Welcome to the playable demo of Feudums, a game currently in development. Remember, this is a free PRE-early access version of the game. You can always find the latest demo on our web page, but for those afraid to download a game from an unknown, we wanted to provide the opportunity to do it inside Steam.

Our demos are always updated as new milestone builds are completed or we have quality of life (QoL) improvements to add. We always invite the community to play our game and give us any feedback you have afterwards. We love to hear from our players!

Just remember, we are PRE-early access: much of the game is not yet available as we continue to plug away on development. This is more like a minimum viable product so you can have a first impression and tell us whether we're on the right track. While we do our best to ship stable previews, don’t be surprised if you find a few bugs. If you are unlucky enough to find one, please make sure to report it so we can fix it for our next update!

If pre-beta games are not your cup of tea, that is completely fine. Please bear with us until we ship a more or less feature-complete public beta.

name: Feudums Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: 64 bit
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any discreet card with at least 2 GB Memory
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Multiplayer only, it requires internet connection to play.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 6 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

short_description: Feudums combines medieval grand strategy with kingdom management in an online multiplayer world. Your challenge is to use your wits, ambition and strategy to grow your noble house against other players and find your place in feudal society, while your legacy is carried over to new game sessions.
